Sometime around this summer, I thought radio was dead (apart from the obviously superb Adam & Joe</a>, self admitted Black Squadron member here), and then I happened across Marc Riley</a>. It's rare to come across a DJ that so nicely fits the type of music I like to listen to, one that probes new music and also happens to cover a lot of bands I've already seen and thought nobody ever had heard of</i>. The fact he used to be in The Fall helps. Slightly. He's had all kinds of people play sessions for him - Joan as Police Woman, Field Music, Strike the Colours..
